Merge branch 'master' into MultiShrink

Better floating button location

Fixed actionbar by removing 'search' from the playlist. Also a lot of cleanup and removal of legacy code

1) Made the PlayerService the owner of the playlist
2) Made the Playlist fragment use the Playlist as datasource instead of a cursor
3) Lots of old code removed
4) Some refactoring
